mapper.update:
update venue_function_zone
function_zone_id = #{functionZoneId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
venue_id = #{venueId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
function_zone_name = #{functionZoneName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update venue_function_zone set function_zone_id = #{functionZoneId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, venue_id = #{venueId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, function_zone_name = #{functionZoneName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT v.venue_id AS venueId,f.id AS functionZoneId ,f.type_name FROM venue_function_zone v INNER JOIN function_zone f ON v.function_zone_id = f.id WHERE v.venue_id = #{venueId}
